titleStmt.title: The fables of Æsop paraphras'd in verse, and adorn'd with sculpture, by John Ogilby.
Aesop's fables. English
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.
Aesop.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Warren for Andrew Crook, at the Green Dragon in St. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved: The fables of Æsop paraphras'd in vers and adornd with sculpture by Iohn Ogilby.
The second book begins new pagination on 2B1r (missigned B); the third book begins new pagination on 3A1r; the fourth book begins new pagination on 4A1r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Green Dragon in St. Pauls Church-yard.
